a.data-title: Emotional Health and Mental Well-Being Resources

img.alt: Emotional Health and Mental Well-Being Resources

div.a: Emotional Health and Mental Well-Being Resources

div.p: With schools and businesses closed and the recent stay-at-home order in the wake of COVID-19, we understand that many students and families are facing a number of complex issues and questions.
In this post, you can find a few resources that can be used to help your family.

div.class:
summary-item summary-item-record-type-text sqs-gallery-design-carousel-slide
summary-item-has-thumbnail summary-item-has-excerpt
summary-item-has-author

a.data-title: District Breakfast/Lunch Pickups and Delivery Service

img.alt: District Breakfast/Lunch Pickups and Delivery Service

div.a: District Breakfast/Lunch Pickups and Delivery Service

div.p: For families looking for access to breakfast and lunch for their children during the week, the Jaffrey-Rindge Cooperative School District is offering both a pickup and a delivery option.
Pickups/deliveries occur on Mondays and Wednesdays. Every child signed up will received two breakfasts and lunches on Monday and three breakfasts and lunches on Wednesdays.

div.class:
summary-item summary-item-record-type-text sqs-gallery-design-carousel-slide
summary-item-has-thumbnail summary-item-has-excerpt
summary-item-has-author

div.p: Given the circumstances of remote learning, we understand that many are having a hard time staying active. Below are two different resources, lead by district volunteers, to help get you and your family up and moving!

div.class:
summary-item summary-item-record-type-text sqs-gallery-design-carousel-slide
summary-item-has-thumbnail summary-item-has-excerpt
summary-item-has-author
